settings.style: cinematic, visionary sci-fi, glowing light, ethereal ambiance

prompts.text: A breathtaking cosmic panorama unfolds in golden light: alien worlds, vast galaxies, and scenes of Vak'tar invasion. Golden lines connect planets like a web. Human and Anari observers watch the vision in awe.

A split scene: one side shows Earth in a utopian future with green cities and peaceful harmony, the other side a ravaged planet scorched by war and covered in shadow. The vision glows between both extremes.

Inside a luminous chamber made of flowing light, human protagonists stand before the Anari council. Elyon, a radiant being with humanoid form and luminous tendrils, addresses the group telepathically.
Side-by-side view of Kythara: one half shows a lush alien paradise with floating crystal towers, the other a ruined wasteland after a Vak’tar attack, bathed in red shadows and debris.
Sarah Chen receives a glowing device from Elyon’s hands, surrounded by holographic symbols and alien code. The group looks on, bathed in iridescent light and awe.
A transparent crystalline chamber forms around the protagonists. Nanotechnology and golden neural webs begin scanning and enhancing their bodies. The setting is surreal and peaceful.

Five people — two women and three men — stand on a grassy hilltop under a pale morning sky. Above them float glowing golden orbs arranged in gentle curves. The group watches silently as the orbs shimmer and cast long, soft shadows on the ground.
Aida, Sarah, Daryl, Father Martinez, and Miriam stand side by side, eyes fixed on the sky. Behind them: consoles, the Anari ship, and golden radiance. Their expressions are calm, ready, and resolute.
